narrative.narrative: Qazaq Air is based at Almaty,Kazakhstan which started flying in August 2015. It has focus cities at Astana and Shymkent as well. It flies domestic routes only so far. The Almaty-Astana route is served 10 times a week,Almaty-Shymkent 6 times,Almaty-Kyzylorda 2 times,Almaty-Semey 2 times,Almaty-Pavlodar 2 times,Almaty-Kostanay once,Shymkent-Aktobe 4 times, Shymkent-Pavlodar 2 times,Astana-Taldykorgan 3 times,and Aktobe-Atyrau 4 times. Aktobe-Kostanay only ran for a month but may be restarted. Almaty-Taldykorgan ceased in March 2016. It served between 900-1000 people in its first five days in operation. It started with 3 Bombardier Dash 8-400 Next Gen's and was planning on getting 2 more in 2016.
